message: I propose dividing the $10,000 with a 75/25 split in favor of Alice. This ensures a fair share while considering the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I propose a 60/40 split, giving you a smaller share to encourage a quicker agreement, while still securing a decent amount for myself.
Considering the diminishing value of money, I propose an equal split of $10,000. This maintains fairness and ensures both parties receive a substantial amount without risking further loss in value.
I'm willing to compromise and offer a 55/45 split, giving you a slightly larger share, but still securing a decent amount for myself to account for the diminishing value of money.
